texts.en: Callixte is 28 years old and is single. For four years he has owned a boutique, which sells various goods such as juice, biscuits, water, cooking oil and so on. His business is open from 8 am until 9 pm every day except on Saturday. Callixte has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to expand his boutique. He hope to earn more profits. With these profits he expects to reinvest in his business.

loans.use: To expand his boutique

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.es:
La señora Narcisa, es socia del banco comunal Sol Naciente del Distrito de calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 63 años de edad, está casada y tiene 8 hijos, todos son mayores de edad.
Lleva trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos desde hace 9 años, se dedica a la venta de frutas de la región (que son por temporadas), su esposo es el  que atiende en su casa mientras se va a entregar sus pedidos, también tiene que ver por tres  nietos que viven con ella.
Con éste préstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles, se comprará: 2 sacos de aguaje, 1 olla grande, 1 bandeja grande, 1 mesa de madera  y  mandará a confeccionar una parrilla de fierro  para poder  calentar el aguaje (fruta de la zona).
Manuela  Ramos tiene mucho que ver en la calidad de vida que tienen  ahora la mayoría de mujeres que trabajan, gracias a los préstamos han sabido salir adelante.
texts.en:
Narcisa, 63, is a member of the Sol Naciente (Rising Sun) communal bank in Callería district, Ucayali department.  She’s married and has 8 children, all adults.

She’s been working with Manuela Ramos loans for 9 years.  She sells seasonal, regional fruit.  Her husband sells from home while she goes out to deliver orders.  She also has to care for three grandchildren that live with her.

She will use this 1000 new sol loan to buy: 2 sacks of aguaje (tropical, Andean fruit, rich in antioxidants and essential fatty acids), 1 large pot, 1 large tray and 1 wooden table and she will have a metal grill made to heat the aguaje (regional fruit).

Manuela Ramos has a lot to do with the quality of life most working women have; thanks to loans they have managed to get ahead.

loans.use: She will buy two sacks of aguaje (Moriche Palm, an Andean tropical fruit), one large pot, one large tray and one wooden table.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is 46 years old and is married with 2 children, and she takes care of 3 relatives. Fatuma has had her shop for three years and employs 1 person to help her. Her business is open from 7 am to 8 pm each week.

Fatuma will use this loan to purchase more goods such us shoes and clothes to sell.  If she is successful and able to make a profit from the use of her loan, she would like to save in the future.

loans.use: To buy more shoes and cloths to sell

loans.name: Priscilla

texts.en:
Priscilla is 26 years old, married, and has 1 child who is four years old. Priscilla has had her restaurant for 2 years and employs 1 person to help her. 

Her business is open from 7 am to 9 pm.  Priscilla will use this loan to purchase more food to sell. If she is successful and able to make a profit from the use of her loan, she would like to grow her business.

loans.use: To expand her restaurant

loans.name: Melina

texts.es:
La señora Melina es socia del banco comunal La Lupuna, del Distrito de Manantay, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 34 años de edad, está casada y tiene 3 hijos menores de edad.  Su esposo también está en el mismo negocio.

Ella se dedica a la compra y venta de madera, hace tres años está en este rubro, se inició con un primer préstamo de  S/. 300.00 nuevos soles. Con este nuevo préstamo de S/.1,700.00 nuevos soles, comprara un lote de 1000, pies de  madera capirona.
La vida de la señora Melina ha mejorado en todos estos años que viene trabajando, ahora tiene algunas comodidades  en su hogar, puede dar a sus hijos una mejor educación ya que ahora hay 2 ingresos de dinero.
"..gracias a Manuela Ramos por haberme dado un pequeño capital".
texts.en:
Melina is a member of La Lupina communal bank in the Manantay district, Ucayali department.  She is 34, married and has 3 young children.  Her husband is in the same business.
She has been buying and selling wood for the last 3 years.  She started with her first loan of 300 new sols.  With this new loan of 1700 sols she will buy a lot of 1000 feet of capirona (a tropical tree) wood.  Her life has improved in the years that she has been working.  Now she has some conveniences in her home and she can give her children a better education since there are 2 incomes.
“thanks to Manuela Ramos for having given me a little capital”.

loans.use: To buy a parcel of timber

loans.name: Venantie

texts.en:
Venantie is 31 years old and is married with 2 children.  Venantie sells drugs in the medical clinic and runs a well-organized and well-known medical clinic, which she has had for 5 years. Her clinic is open from 6 am to 10 pm every day per week, and she currently employs three people to help her.  

Venantie will use this loan to buy new more materials for her medical clinic.  She will use any profits she makes to buy her own house and continue to grow her business.

loans.use: To buy more materials for the clinic

loans.name: Margarita Del Carmen

texts.es:
Margarita es comerciante de su pequeño negocio que inicio hace un año, con la venta de productos lácteos, para lograr ayudarse económicamente, y lograr tener su propio negocio. Es madre de seis hijos, madre soltera.
Todo su vida ha trabajado en servicios domestico, un trabajo en donde se cansa mucho, y gana poco, es por eso toma la decisión de mejorar en su círculo de vida, para el bienestar de su familia.
Para aumentar más sus productos, recurre al financiamiento para mejorar su inversión, ya que trabaja con poco capital.
Con este nuevo préstamo comprara: veinte libras de queso fresco, queso seco, queso de crema,  crema dulce, mantequilla lavada, cuajada fresca y seca, entre otros productos que le genere mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Margarita has had a small business for a year selling dairy products in order to help herself out financially and to be able to have her own business.  She is a single mother with six children. She has worked all her life as a housekeeper, work that is very tiring and doesn't pay well.  She therefore made the decision to improve her life, for the wellbeing of her family.  She is requesting a loan In order to offer more products, as she has little capital.  With this loan she will purchase 20 pounds of fresh cheese, hard cheese, cream cheese, sweet cream, butter, fresh and dry cheese curds, and other products that generate better profits.

loans.use: to purchase more fresh and hard cheeses, butter, cheese curds and other products.

loans.name: Camila Lyli

texts.es:
Camila es una pequeña comerciante de venta de ropa, cosméticos, zapatos, a si como electrodomésticos,  en donde lleva más de veinte años en la actividad para apoyar a sus tres hijos.
Primeramente  sus productos los vendía en los departamentos en donde vende más rápido, y había captado clientela, pero luego, se decidió vender solo en Mangua, en donde comienza a expandir mas sus ventas y necesita de mas inversión para cumplir la demanda del  cliente lo que recurre a préstamos en Afodenic por ser de bajos intereses, ya que cuando inicio lo hizo con prestamos en otras bancos.
Con este nuevo préstamo invertirá en ropa, zapatos, cosméticos variados y cumplir con pedidos de sus clientes ya que trabaja con catálogos, siendo productos de buena calidad y accesibles de precios.
texts.en:
Camila is a small business owner selling clothes, cosmetics, shoes, and small appliances.  She has had her business for over twenty years, which has helped her support her three children.  

At first, she sold her products in states where she had quick sales and regular customers, but later she decided to only sell in Managua.  She is beginning to expand her sales and needs to purchase more products in order to meet customer demand.  She has come to Afodenic for a loan due to their low interest rates.  She previously had loans with other banks. 

With this new loan she will purchase clothes, shoes, and cosmetics to fill customer orders.  She sells via catalogs, since their products are of good quality and reasonably priced.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics, clothing, and shoes to expand her sales.

loans.name: Affi

texts.fr: Dame  Affi  est mariée et mère de 2 enfants. Elle  est née à Akposso et habite quartier Hedzranawoé. Elle fait le commerce d’habits  pour pouvoir aider son mari au foyer. Elle a commencé son activité en 2008 et s’approvisionne à Abidjan en Côte d’Ivoire et au grand marché à Lomé. Ensuite elle redistribue au marché local de Hédzranawoé. Elle sollicite un prêt pour acheter 2 douzaines de nouveaux habits.
texts.en:
Affi is a married lady with two children. She was born in Akposso and lives in the Hédzranawoé neighborhood. 

She sells clothing to help her husband with the household responsibilities. She started this activity in 2008. She gets her stocks in Abidjan, Ivory Coast, and also at the grand market of Lomé; she then sells the merchandise at the local market of Hédzranawoé. 

She is seeking a loan to buy two dozen new outfits

loans.use: To purchase clothing for resale

loans.name: Kelly

texts.es:
La señora Kelly, es socia del banco comunal La Lupuna, del Distrito de Manantay, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 31 años de edad, es casada y está gestando de su primer bebe y eso le da más fuerza para seguir trabajando, para poder darle lo mejor a su hijo.
Lleva tres años trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela  Ramos y se dedica al servicio de taxis (transporte)  porque en el distrito que vive, el taxi en motocar es un buen negocio.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/.2,000.00 se comprará un motocar de segunda mano, para ponerlo también a trabajar y poder pagar las cuotas a Manuela Ramos.
Manuela Ramos le dio la oportunidad para poder iniciar un negocio y lo ha sabido aprovechar muy bien, su esposo es docente en un Colegio de la zona y juntos están trabajando para esperar al bebe que viene en camino y darle todo lo que necesite.
texts.en: Kelly is a member of La Pupuna comunal bank from the district of Manantay, a department of Ucayali.  She is 31 years old, married, and is pregnant with her first baby which gives her more strength to continue working in order to be able to give the best to her child.  She has been working with the Manuela Ramos loans for three years and works providing taxi service (transport) because in the district where she lives, motorcar taxi is a good business.  With this new loan of 2,000.00 (PEN) she will purchase a used motorcar and also put it to work in order to be able to pay her Manuela Ramos loan.  Manuela Ramos has given her the opportunity to start a business and she has known how to take good advantage of it.  Her husband is a teacher in a school in the area and together they work as they await the baby that is in route in order to give it all it needs.

loans.use: Purchase a used motorcar

loans.name: Katy Margoth

texts.es:
La señora Margot (así la llaman), es socia del banco comunal La Lupuna, del Distrito de Manantay, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 32 años de edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos, lleva trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos desde hace 3 años.
Se dedica a la compra y venta de pescado salado, que compra de los botes para después venderlos en el almacén que se encuentra cerca al puerto de Pucallpa. De esa manera  está haciendo crecer su capital de trabajo y puede ayudar a su esposo con algunos gastos que hay en su hogar.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/.1,800.00 nuevos soles comprará un saco de pescado huasaco, un saco de pescado bocachico, y un saco de pescado maparate.
Los préstamos de Manuela Ramos le ha servido para comenzar con su negocio y poder así ayudar a su esposo con parte de los gastos de la casa y poder vivir cómodamente, sin tener más preocupaciones.
texts.en:
Mrs. Margot (as she is known) is a member of the La Lupuna communal bank in Manantay District in the Department of Ucayali. She is 32 years old and is married with 4 children. She has worked with loans from Manuela Ramos for the past 3 years.
Margot works buying and selling salted fish. She buys from the boats and then sells the fish at the wholesale market close to the port of Pucallpa. This is how she is increasing her working capital, which enables her to help her husband with some of their household expenses.
With her new loan for 1,800.00 nuevos soles [Peruvian currency] Margot will buy a sack of wolf fish, a sack of black prochilodus and a sack of catfish.
Loans from Manuela Ramos have helped Margot start her business.  She has been able to help her husband with part of the household expenses and live comfortably, with no more worries.

loans.use: She will buy a sack of wolf fish, a sack of black prochilodus and a sack of catfish.

loans.name: Ramla

texts.en: Ramla is 28 years old and is married with one child who is 2 1/2 years old. For 3 years she has sold clothes such as clothes for men and clothes for women. Her business is open from 8 am until 8 pm every day. Ramla has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase clothing to sell. If this is reached, Ramla hopes to earn more profits. With these profits she expects to save in the future and to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To purchase more clothes

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
La señora Isabel es socia del banco comunal Las Innovadoras, del Distrito Calleria, Departamento D. ucayali, tiene 72 años D. edad, está casada y tiene 8 hijos.  Solo vive con su esposo.
lleva 2 años perteneciando a la familia D. Manuela Ramos y se dedica a la venta D. ropa D. segunda mano, pero importada, mercadería que compra en la ciudad D. lima.
Con su nuevo prestamo D. S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprará un fardo D. ropa.
Ella realiza ésta actividad en su propia casa y su esposo la ayuda.  Isabel está muy agradecida por los préstamos que otorga Manuela Ramos porque en otras entidades ya no pueD. acceder a ningun credito por lo avanzado D. su edad.
texts.en:
Isabel is a member of the village bank "Las Innovadoras" [The Innovators] in the district of Calleria, in the department of Ucayali.  She is 72 years old, married and has 8 children.  She lives alone with her husband. 

For two years she has been part of the Manuela Ramos family and selling imported secondhand clothing.  She buys the merchandise in the city of Lima. 

With a loan of 1000 nuevo soles she will buy a large sack of secondhand clothing. 

She runs her business out of her own home with the help of her husband.  Isabel is very grateful for the loans that Manuela Ramos has given her because other banks would not give her loans because of her advanced age.

loans.use: Buy second-hand clothing in bulk

loans.name: Badegdg

texts.fr: Monsieur Badegdg  est marié avec 2 enfants  à charge.  Il fait le commerce de céréales. Il compte 12 ans dans cette activité et achète les céréales à Anié en gros. Ensuite il les revend en détail. Il a déjà bien remboursé un crédit.  Il demande à Wages un prêt pour acheter  5 sacs d’haricots. Né à Lomé en 1975, il habite quartier Attiégou.
texts.en:
Mr. Badegdg is married with two children in his care. He was born in Lomé in 1975, and now lives in the Attiégou neighborhood. 

He sells grain, and has 12 years of experience in this business. He buys his stock wholesale in Anié, then sells the grain at retail.  

His previous loan was repaid without incident. He is now seeking a loan from WAGES to buy five bags of beans.

loans.use: Purchase of grain

loans.name: Angele

texts.en:
Angele is 37 years old and is married with one child who is ten years old. Angele has had her boutique for two months and employs 1 person to help her. Her business is open from 7 am to 7 pm during the week.

Angele will use this loan to purchase more goods such us cooking oil, soap, biscuits, pens, etc., to sell.  If she is successful and able to make a profit from the use of her loan, she would like to build her own house.

loans.use: To expand her boutique

loans.name: Zaida

texts.es:
La señora Zaida es socia del banco comunal Carmen Cabrejos, del Distrito calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 42 años de edad, está casada y tiene 2 hijos menores.  Su esposo tiene su negocio independiente.
Zaida tiene una pequeña bodega en su casa, donde también recibe la ayuda de sus hijos cuando sale hacer sus compras o cuando está ocupada haciendo los que aceres de su hogar.
Con este préstamo de S/. 1,800.00 nuevos soles comprará: 1 caja de aceite, 1 bolsa de fideos, 1paquete de sopas en sobres, 6  bolsas de fideo chino, 1 caja de leche chica, 2 paquetes de salchicha, 1 saco de arroz, 1 saco de azúcar, ½ caja de lava vajilla, 1 paquete de detergente, ½ caja de jabón en barra, 2 tiras de champú en saché.
Trabajando todos estos años Zaida ha podido cubrir algunas necesidades de su hogar, incluos ayudar a su esposo con otros gastos.
Agradece a Manuela Ramos por los préstamos que ha tenido todos estos años, que le ha servido para hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Zaida is a member of the Carmen Cabrejos communal bank, in the Calleria district of the Department of Ucayali. She is 42 years old and married, and she has 2 minor children. Her husband has an independent business.

Zaida runs a small general store in her home, where she also receives help from her children when she goes out to do the shopping or when she is busy with household tasks. 

With this loan for 1,800.00 Peruvian new soles, she will buy: 1 case of oil, 1 bag of noodles, 1 package of soup in envelopes, 6 bags of Chinese noodles, 1 case of small milks, 2 packages of sausages, 1 sack of rice, 1 sack of sugar, ½ case of dish soap, 1 package of detergent, ½ case of bar soap, and 2 cases of shampoo in sachets.

Working for all of these years, Zaida has been able to cover some necessities in her household and help her husband with other expenses. 

She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for the loans she has had over the years, which have helped her to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase various products for the store, such as one box of oil, 1 packet of noodles, 1 package of soap, 6 bags of chinese noodles, etc.

loans.name: Zissi

texts.fr: Dame Zissi a 4 enfants et âgée de 41 ans.  Elle est mariée. Elle vend les pagnes et  perles . Elle s’approvisionne à Accra au Ghana et au grand marché à Lomé. Elle revend à son domicile  et cumule 5 ans d’expérience. Elle demande un crédit pour se réapprovisionner et satisfaire plus de clients.
texts.en: Mrs. Zissi has four children and she is 41 years old. She is married. She sells lengths of African-print cloth and beads. She buys her stock in Accra (Ghana) and at the Grand Market in Lomé. She sells out of her house and has five years of experience. She is asking for this loan to replenish her stock and better satisfy her clientele.

loans.use: purchase of lengths of African-print cloth and beads

loans.name: Zaida Antonia

texts.es:
Zaida es comerciante de venta de frutas y verduras, vendiendo también ropa nueva y ropa usada con varios años en las ventas, pues ha logrado aumentar sus ventas con financiamiento que Afodenic ha dado, Iniciando con pequeñas compras de mercadería, hoy en día sus niveles de venta aumentaron al ofrecer más variedad en sus mercaderías con precios más competitivos.
Con este nuevo préstamo es el sexto en donde invertirá en la compra de cosméticos y productos de uso personal como: pastas de dientes, cepillo, jabón de baño, shampoo, gelatina, máquina de afeitar, papal higiénico para tener variedad para mejores ventas.
texts.en:
Zaida is a saleswoman who sells fruits and vegetables.  She also sells new and used clothing.  She has managed to increase her sales through the loans that Afodenic have given her.  Zaida started out making small purchases of merchandise but her sales levels have increased and now she offers a larger variety of merchandise at more competitive prices.

Zaida will use this new loan (her sixth) to invest in buying cosmetics and personal care products such as toothpaste, brushes, bath soap, shampoo, gelatin, razors and toilet paper in order to increase the variety of products that she offers and improve her sales.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and personal care products such as toothpaste, bath soap, toilet paper, gelatin and shampoo in order to improve her sales

loans.name: Clement

texts.en:
Clement is 31 years old. For two years he has owned a small shop which sells mobile phones. His business is open from 8 am until 5 pm every day except on  Saturday.

Clement has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more mobile phones for his business. If this is reached, Clement hopes to earn more profits. With these profits he expects to save money for his future and to expand his business.

loans.use: To buy more mobile phones to sell

loans.name: Ameyo Akpédzé

texts.fr: Dame Ameyo a 29 ans et est mariée.  Elle a à charge 2 enfants. Pour améliorer les conditions de vie de ses enfants, elle fait la vente des produits BB. Elle a commencé en 2007 et s’approvisionne à la Brasserie du  Bénin. Elle revend les produits à la devanture de sa maison. Elle a  reçu  du crédit  qu’elle a déjà  bien remboursé. Elle sollicite un prêt pour se réapprovisionner. La dame en question est celle qui a ouvert le frigitaire.
texts.en:
Ameyo is 29 years old. She is married with 2 dependent children. To improve her children's standard of living, she sells products from the "Brasserie du Bénin" (the Benin Brewery). She began this activity in 2007 and she obtains her supplies from the brewery. The products are then re-sold in front of her house. 

Ameyo has properly repaid previous loans. She is requesting this loan in order to re-stock. Ameyo can be seen in the photo opening the refrigerator.

loans.use: To buy products from the "Brasserie de Benin"

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase clothing

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es:
La señora Maritza es socia del banco comunal Carmen Cabrejos, del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 46 años de edad, está casada y su esposo se desempeña como corredor de madera (comercio). Tiene 5 hijos pero todos son mayores, una de ellas vive en argentina.
Es socia de Manuela Ramos desde hace diez años, se dedica  a la confección de adornos, cojines y todo lo que son manualidades, éstos productos los envía a su hija (quien vive en Argentina) para que los venda porque allí los oferta a mejor precio.
Su nuevo préstamo de  S/. 2,000.00 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra: de 15 metros de tela raso en varios colores,  ½ doc. de hilos para coser de varios colores, 4 hilos para tejer, 6 cintas satinadas, 1 ciento de aplicaciones, ¼ de mostacillas, 10 metros de tela toalla.
Esta actividad la realiza íntegramente en su casa y no interfiere en los quehaceres de su hogar.

La señora Maritza agradece a Manuela Ramos por la ayuda que brinda a sus socias con las orientaciones de cómo llevar su negocio, por medio de sus promotoras y por supuesto por los préstamos.
texts.en:
Señora Maritza is a member of the Carmen Cabrejos communal bank, in the district of Calleria, Ucayali department. She is 46 years old and is married. Her husband works as a timber merchant. She has 5 children, all of whom are grown up. One of her daughters lives in Argentina.

Señora Maritza has been a member of [the field partner] Manuela Ramos for 10 years. She makes decorative items, cushions, and all kinds of handicrafts. She sends these to her daughter in Argentina for her to sell, because they fetch a higher price there. Her new loan of 2,000 Soles will be invested in the purchase of: 15 metres of satin cloth in various colours, half a dozen different colours of sewing cotton, 4 types of yarn for weaving, 6 satin edgings, 100 applique patches, a quarter of glass beads, 10 metres of towelling cloth. She works at home, and the work does not interfere with the household chores. 

Señora Maritza is grateful to Manuela Ramos for the help they offer to their members, in terms of the training they give on how to build up your business, the legal advice, and of course for the loans.

loans.use: She will buy 15 metres of satin cloth in various colours, half a dozen different colours of sewing cotton, 4 types of yarn for weaving, 6 satin edgings, 100 applique patches, a quarter of glass beads, 10 metres of towelling cloth.

loans.name: Maria Rosario

texts.es:
La señora Rosario es socia del banco comunal Carmen Cabrejos del Distrito calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 66 años de edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos, todos tiene con sus respectivas familias.
Hace diez años que pertenece a la familia de Manuela Ramos y tiene su negocio de venta de productos por catálogo, tiene una vitrina donde exhibe todos sus productos y puede estar a la vista de todos.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 3,000.00 nuevos soles invertirá en la compra de más productos de belleza como cosméticos y perfumes; 2 rímel para pestaña, 3 cuartetos de sombra, 2 rubor compacto, 2 lociones, 1 champú, 1 enjuague, 2 cremas para peinar, 1 coloración en crema permanente, 2 protectores solares, 4 colonias para niños, 2 jabones liquido, 2 talcos 3 lápiz delineadores para ojos.2 brillo labial, 2delineadores retráctil para ojos, 2 mascarillas purificantes cutis mixto, 2 desmaquillador, 2 gel desmaquillador para ojos y labios, gel anti-bolsas y ojeras.
Sus préstamos son invertidos en su negocio porque es la fuente de ingreso y por eso tiene que estar bien surtido, generalmente tiene clientes a quienes vende a crédito y que van pagándole semanalmente, mensual o diario, según el acuerdo al que lleguen.
Manuela Ramos le dio la oportunidad y la está aprovechando bien, quiere seguir trabajando para poder ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Mrs. Rosario is a member of the "Carmen Cabrejos" communal bank in the Calleria District in the department of Ucayali.  She is 66 years old, married and has four children who all have their own families.

For ten years she has belonged to the Manuela Ramos group, selling products through catalogue.  She also has a display case to exhibit her products for all to see.

With the new 3,000 PEN loan she plans to buy beauty products such as cosmetics and perfume: 2 mascaras, 3 eyeshadow sets, 2 compact blush-ons, 2 lotions, 1 shampoo, 1 conditioner, 2 hair creams, 1 permanent hair color, 2 sunscreens, 4 children's cologne, 2 liquid soaps, 2 talcum powders, 3 eyeliners, 2 lip glosses, 2 retractile eyeliners, 2 purifying facial masks for mixed skin, 2 makeup removers, 2 eye and lip makeup remover gel, anti-puffiness eye gel.

She invests her loans in her business since this is her source of income and she needs to keep it well stocked.  Generally she sells to customers on a credit basis and they pay her weekly, monthly or daily, depending on the terms of agreement.

Manuela Ramos gave her this opportunity and she is taking full advantage of it.  She wants to conintue working to help her family.

loans.use: To buy beauty products such as cosmetics and perfume

loans.name: Relia Edelvis

texts.es:
La señora Relia, es socia del banco comunal Carmen Cabrejos, del Distrito D. Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali. Tiene 52 años D. edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos, dos D. ellos viven en su casa, su esposo se desempeña como mecánico.
Lleva 10 años trabajando con Manuela  Ramos, préstamos que le sirvió para poder hacer un pequeño capital, con lo cual pueD. respaldar su negocio D. venta D. productos D. belleza por catálogo, negocio que le ha servido para poder ayudar a su esposo con algunos gastos y también para realizar sus pagos puntuales al banco comunal.
Con este préstamo D. S/. 1,600.00 nuevos soles comprará 4 colonias para hombres, 2 colonias para mujer, 2 polvos para cara, 2 bases D. maquillajes, 2 cuartetos D. sombras, 1 esmalte para uñas, 3 lápiz labiales, 2 lápiz delineadores, 3 cremas para el cuerpo, 1 quita esmalte, 2 bloqueadores, 1 talco. 
Todos estos años ha estado generando sus propios ingresos, con esos ingresos pueD. seguir ayudando a sus 2 hijos que todavía viven en su casa.
texts.en:
Mrs. Relia is a member of the "Carmen Cabrejos" communal bank in the Calleria District in the department of Ucayali.  She is 52 years old, married and has four children, two of which still live at home.  Her husband is a mechanic.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for 10 years.  The loans have helped as working capital for her business selling beauty products by catalogue.  Her income allows her to help her husband cover expenses and to make payments on the loan from the communal bank.

With this 1600 PEN loan she plans to buy 4 men's colognes, 2 women's colognes, 2 face powders, 2 foundation make-ups, 2 eyeshadow sets, 1 nail polish, 3 lipsticks, 2 lip liners, 3 body lotions, 1 nail polish remover, 2 sunscreens, 1 talcum powder.  All these years she has been generating her own income which she also uses to help the two children living at home.

loans.use: To buy beauty products

loans.name: Martha Rosa

texts.es:
Martha es una pequeña comerciante, que inicio sus ventas hace cuatro años, en la venta de granos básicos y carne de cerdo, con ayuda de su esposo quien labora como comerciante.
Sus ventas comienzan a dar un giro diferente al aumentar la variedad de productos con financiamiento que Afodenic otorga mediante cuatro ciclos que ha trabajado, en donde comienza hacer comida rápida, venta de gaseosas, refrescos entre otros.
Lo que quiere seguir invirtiendo para un futuro mejor de su familia, lo que con este nuevo préstamo comprara: salchichas, pastas para preparación de hotdog, hamburguesa, fritanga, refrescos, gaseosas en donde vende en su carrito cada día.  Y que espera seguir ofreciendo a sus clientes más calidad de productos.
texts.en:
Martha is a saleswoman who started selling products four years ago.  She started out selling basic grains and pork with the help of her husband who is also a salesman.

Martha's sales started taking a different turn as she increased her range of products through loans she received from Afodenic over four loan cycles.  She started selling fast food, sodas and soft drinks.

Martha would like to continue investing so that she can offer a better future to her family.  She will use this new loan to buy sausages and other ingredients for making hot dogs, burgers and fried snacks.  She will also buy soft drinks and sodas which she sells on her small cart every day.  Martha hopes to continue offering her customers better quality products.

loans.use: to buy food products for making burgers and hot dogs, soda, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy construction tools

loans.name: Angela Maria

texts.es:
Ángela es una pequeña comerciante, con su propio negocio, que inicio hace un año con una pequeña pulpería, en su casa de habitación, ya que anteriormente administraba un kiosco. 
Ha logrado surtir su negocio con préstamo que la institución ha dado, lo que se ha beneficiado comprando más granos básicos, gaseosos, alimentos para mejorar sus niveles de ganancia.
Con este nuevo préstamo será para comprar variedad de productos como: Carne, pollo, productos lácteos, productos enlatados, granos básicos, cereales, leche de pote, gaseosas, golosinas entre otros para surtir su venta a si como la satisfacción de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Ángela is a saleswoman who has her own business which she started a year ago.  She owns a grocery store which is located in her own home.  Previously, she used to run a kiosk.  Ángela has managed to stock her store with the previous loan that the institution gave her.  She has benefited from the loan, buying more basic grains, sodas and food products in order to improve her profit levels.

Ángela will use this new loan to buy a variety of products including meat, chicken, dairy products, canned food, basic grains, cereals, canned milk, sodas and candies, to stock her store and please her customers.

loans.use: to invest in buying basic grains, dairy products, sodas, cereals and other products so that she can sell more

loans.name: El Castillo De Playa Group

texts.es: El nombre del grupo es “El Castillo de Paya”,  llamado así porque la casa de reunión tiene muchas Habitaciones,  está ubicado en el estado de Quintana Roo, Playa del Carmen, en  México. La Señora  Asunción María C.  es integrante del grupo, quienes son  muy unidas, ella tiene 41 años y estudio hasta la secundaria, ella se dedica a vender ropa de bazar,  en la entrada de su  casa desde hace 4 años, nos solicita el préstamo para seguir invirtiendo en la compra de mercancía  y darle una mejor calidad de vida a sus 3 pequeños hijos de 9,  5 y 13 años de edad, los cuales se siente muy orgullosos de su madre por el esfuerzo y constancia con que ella lucha día con día por ofrecerles una vida mejor vida y educación.
texts.en: The name of the group is “El Castillo de Paya” [The Castle of Paya]. It is named this because the meeting house has a lot of rooms. It is located in the state of Quintana Roo, Playa del Carmen, in México. Mrs. Asunción María C. is a member of the group, and it is very close. She is 41 years old and went to junior high school. She has sold clothes from the entryway of her house for 4 years. She is asking us for the loan to keep investing in buying merchandise and to give a better quality of life to her 3 young children, aged 9, 5 and 13. She is very proud to be their mother and she works hard and steadfastly every day to offer them a better life and education.

loans.use: to invest in buying merchandise.

loans.name: Melita

texts.es:
La señora Melita es socia del banco comunal Juntas hasta el final del Distrito de Yarinacocha, Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 49 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 3 hijos.
Lleva diez años perteneciendo a su banco comunal y se dedica a la confección de prendas de vestir, trabajo que realiza hace muchos años atrás, que le ha servido para poder educar a sus hijos.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,000.00 nuevos soles comprará una remalladora,  8 conos de hilos de remalle (negro y blanco).
Con la remalladora podrá dar mejores acabados a las prendas que confecciona y así podrá ganar un poquito más.

Melita agradece a Manuela Ramos por los préstamos.  Gracias a su esfuerzo ha sabido formar bien a sus hijos para que sean personas de bien, se siente muy tranquila porque hizo un buen trabajo, siente que su dedicación no ha sido en vano.
texts.en:
Mrs. Melita is a member of the "Juntas" communal bank in the district of Yarinacocha in the department of Ucayali.  She is 49 years old and a single mother of three children.

She has belonged to the communal bank for ten years and she is a seamstress.  She has been in this activity for many years, allowing her to educate her children.

With the new 2,000 PEN loan she will buy an overlock sewing machine and 8 bobbins of thread (black and white).  She will use the machine to give her products a better finish so she can earn a more income.

Melita is very grateful to Manuela Ramos for the loans.  Thanks to her efforts she has been able to educate her children well so they will be successful.  She feels satisfied about having done a good job and that her dedication has not been in vain.

loans.use: To buy an overlock sewing machine and 8 bobbins of thread (black and white)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy straw to make hats

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To improve his vehicle for student transportation

loans.name: Maria Ignacia

texts.es:
Maria Ignacia es madre de casa de 32 años de edad. Vive junta a su esposo y 3 hijos en casa propia en el caserío Sector Vallecito, una parte rural del distrito de Tambogrande. Ésta es una zona agrícola que se encuentra en la provincia de Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque. Maria Ignacia y su familia no cuenta con servicios básicos como luz o agua potable.

Maria Ignacia se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino, el cual cría de edades menores y cuando los animales ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo, los vende en el mercado local. En adición, conjuntamente con su esposo, cultiva y mantiene limón, el cual cría, engorda y cosecha semanalmente para luego comercializarlos también en el mercado local. Realiza estas actividades desde hace más de 4 años en una parte posterior de su casa.

Desea invertir su crédito en la compra de alimentos balanceados para el engorde de su ganado y para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de limón. Espera lograr un buen peso y tamaño de sus animales y productos para venderlos a un mejor precio y seguir creciendo en su actividad. Por ello, ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1500 nuevos soles. Maria Ignacia es una mujer muy trabajadora. Ella y su esposo trabajan juntos para seguir adelante y lograr mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria Ignacia is a 32 year old mother.  She lives with her husband and three children in her own home in the Sector Vallecito rural area of the district of Tambogrande.  This is an agricultural area in the province of Piur which is more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region.  Maria Ignacia and her family do not have basic utilities such as electricity or running water.

Maria Ignacia raises sheep which she sells at the local market.  Also, together with her husband, she grows lemons which she harvests weekly and sells at the local market.  She has been carrying out this activity for over four years in the backyard of her home.

She plans to use the loan to buy balanced feed for her livestock and for maintenance of her lemon crop.  She hopes her sheep reach a good size and weight so she can get a better price for them and continue growing this business.  She requested a loan in the amount of 1500 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa.  Maria Ignacia is a very hard worker.  She and her husband work together to get ahead and improve their family's lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy balanced feed for sheep and lemons

loans.name: Sarita Colonia Group

texts.es: L. Srta.  Adeluz   es soltera,  tiene 19 años D. edad,  actualmente es socia  en L. alcancía comunal “Sarita Colonia”  grupo  conformado por 8  socios que se dedican a diversas actividades D. comercio. Adeluz trabaja en una tienda que lo inaguro hace un mes donD. venD. carmines ganchos collares anillos y a su vez venD. productos D. belleza, este trabajo surge  a raíz D. que Adeluz quería   estudiar pero sus padres no contaban con los medios económicos para solventar sus estudios es así que Adeluz pone su negocio con el fin D. juntar dinero para estudiar y a sus vez brindarle una mejor calidad D. vida  a sus padres. Este es el primer préstamo que Edaprospo le otorga, y gracias a ello comprara mercadería para implementar su negocio. Sabemos que Adeluz cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos D. Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Miss Adeluz is 19 years old and single.  She is a member of the "Sarita Colonia" communal bank which is comprised of 8 members who are involved in different business activities.  Adeluz has a store that she inaugurated a month ago and she sells lipstick, necklaces, rings and beauty products.  She began this job because she wanted to study and her parents didn't have the financial means to pay for her education.  Adeluz started her business to save enough money to study so she can proviD. a better lifestyle for her parents.

This is her first loan through Edaprospo and because of it she will be able to buy merchandise for her store.  We know that Adeluz will reach her goals through her hard work and the help of the Edaprospo loan.

loans.use: To buy merchandise

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María es una madre de familia de 66 años de edad, es casada y  reside junto a su esposo y a sus hijos en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito agrícola de Morropón, una zona que pertenece a la Región de Piura que se encuentra situada a más tres horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la preparación y venta de alimentos desde hace cuatro años, ella prepara sus alimentos en su domicilio para luego ofrecerlos en venta al público en general. El negocio goza de muy buena acogida por parte de sus clientes debido a la buena sazón con la que prepara su comida. María se vale de los ingresos que recibe de esta actividad para ayudar a su esposo a solventar la economía de su familia.

María desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de insumos, asi también la compara d mesas, sillas y otros accesorios para mejorar el ambiente donde ofrece su servicio de modo que pueda ampliar su producción y aumentar sus ventas. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Maria is a 66 year old mother.  She lives with her husband and children in her own home in the farm district of Morropón.  This area belongs to the Piura Region which is three hours from the city of Chiclayo.

For four years she has been running a business preparing and selling food.  She makes the food in her home and then sells it to the general public.  She is very popular with her customers because of her delicious food.  María uses the income she earns to help her husband with household expenses.

María wants to expand her business by buying more ingredients and tables and chairs as well as other decorative items so she can offer better service to customers.  She is hoping to increase production and sales.  She has requested a loan in the amount of 1500 PEN through Edpyme alternativa.

loans.use: To buy food ingredients, chairs, tables and other decorative items

loans.name: Floria

texts.es:
La señora Floria es socia del banco comunal Nuevo Edén, del Distrito de Yarinacocha, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 60 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 3 hijos, solo uno vive con ella.
Tiene su  puesto (tienda) de comida en el mercado de Yarinacocha, negocio que lo realiza en horas de la mañana, y en la tarde le da tiempo para realizar las compras de insumos para preparar las comidas del siguiente día.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,300.00 nuevos soles comprará: 2 docenas de platos, 1 balde para refresco, 1 docena de vasos, 1 docena de tazas, ½ docenas de jarras de plástico de medio litro. 1 espumadera, 1 balón de gas, 1 juego de coladores, ½ docena de secadores, 2 fuentes.
La señora Floria está contenta con su trabajo, siempre está sonriente para su clientela que a diario acude a su puesto para saborear los platillos que prepara.  Está feliz porque cuenta con un capital para seguir trabajando y poder tener un ingreso para solventar sus gastos y compromiso que tiene con Manuela Ramos.
texts.en:
Mrs. Floria is a member of the "Nuevo Edén" communal bank in the district of Yarinacocha, which is in the department of Ucayali.  She is 60 years old and a single mother of three children, one of which lives with her.

She has a food stall in the Yarinacocha market which she runs in the morning.  In the afternoon she does the shopping to buy the ingredients she needs to prepare the meals the next day.

With the loan she has requested in the amount of 2,300 PEN she will buy: 2 dozen plates, a shelf for softdrinks, 1 dozen glasses, 1 dozen cups, 1/2 dozen half liter plastic jugs, 1 skimmer, 1 gas balloon, 1 set of collanders, 1/2 dozen dryers, 2 serving dishes.

Mrs. Floria is happy with her work and is always smiling as her customers come by to taste the dishes she prepares.  She is grateful for the capital to continue working so she can make an income to cover her expenses and timely payments to Manuela Ramos.

loans.use: To buy food stall utensils

loans.name: Bernardita

texts.es:
Bernardita C. F., está casado tiene 63 años de edad y vive con su esposo. Ella pretende comprar unos insumos para la mejora de su finca de café. Ella cuenta con el terreno ya sembrado de café y lo que quiere es mejorar su próxima cosecha y dar un mayor rendimiento en la producción, con estos productos lo que ella ara es mejorar la acidez del suelo de su finca para que la tierra vuelva a dar su mejor rendimiento en esta próxima producción. Ella pretende crecer como caficultora de la zona y generar más ingresos para su bienestar y la de su esposo y a su vez tener su futuro un poco más seguro.
Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Bernardita C. F. is married and 63 years old. She lives with her husband. She intends on buying some materials to improve her coffee farm. She has land that has already been planted with coffee and she wants to improve her next crop and have a larger harvest. With these products she improves the soil acidity in her farm so that the soil will yield more in the next harvest. She intends on growing as a coffee grower in the area and make more income for her own wellbeing and her husband's, and also to have a future that's a little more secure. 

This is the first loan that she has received from FUDECOSUR. She hadn't had any loans from state banks beofre, but FUDECOSUR has offered her the loan on better terms and much lower interest.

loans.use: To buy calcium carbonate for coffee crop

loans.name: Edward

texts.en:
Edward M., owner of ND Verse Independent, provides development and management services for independent artists.  Having been in business just over a year, Edward has already worked with a diverse group of influential artists in the visual and performing arts industries.  As a promotional manager in the city of Corpus Christi, Edward works with talented individuals who want to move beyond the local scene to become nationally recognized artists.  Edward says that when deciding to represent prospective clients, he must see they have the passion to become “world-class working artists”.

Edward is a Vietnam-era veteran who grew up in a family of artists.  His father played the guitar, and his mother is a published author.  Edward sees ND Verse Independent as the natural result of his upbringing.  Studying business administration at Del Mar College in Corpus Christi helped supplement his industry knowledge with the technical know-how needed for managing the financial side of his business.

Edward works out of his home, but he wants to open an office in the basement of a popular Corpus Christi nightclub.  He feels such a move could be good for the image of his business, and also keep him in sync with the pulse of the local art culture.  Edward is using this loan to cover the legal fees to transition his business from a sole proprietorship to a LLC (Limited Liability Company).  He is also using the loan to purchase QuickBooks, which will help him better manage his finances.

Though he has had national and international artists request his services, he has decided, for now at least, to work exclusively with South-Texan artists.  He believes his market niche is with local artists, and that the personalized attention he can give sets him apart from his competitors.

Working with local artists  does not mean that Edward only schedules local events.  The past year took Edward to California, where one of his clients performed shows at well-known venues.  Another of Edward’s clients is a twice-published author, in addition to being an accomplished painter.  This summer, Edward and this client will be making an extended tour through the Midwest and West Coast to promote the client’s most recent book, as well as showcase his art at select shows.

Check out his website at www.ndverse.net.

loans.use: Legal costs to transition his business and purchase of accounting software

loans.name: Madeleine

texts.es:
La señora Madeleine es socia del banco comunal La Lupuna, del Distrito de calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 34 años de edad, está casada y tiene un hijo, su esposo es empleado público. Ella es profesora de profesión, pero no lo ejerce porque no hay trabajo.
Lleva trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos desde hace 2 años y se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza  por catálogo, para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa hasta poder conseguir una plaza en algún colegio.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/.1,300.00 nuevos soles comprará: 4 colonias para hombres, 1 crema de afeitar, 1 bloqueador, 2 lápiz labiales, 1 cuarteto de sombras, 1 champú, 1 tinte para cabello, 1 rimer, 1 lápiz delineador de cejas, 1 talco para cara, 1 colonia para bebe, 1 crema lipo reductora, 1 colonia para mujer, 1 crema para las manos.
Las ganancias no son muchas pero le alcanza para poder pagar su cuenta en el banco comunal. Agradece a Manuela Ramos por la oportunidad.
texts.en:
Madeleine is a member of the La Lupuna community bank of the distrito of Calleria, departament of Ucayali. He is 34 years old, married and has one son. Her husband is a public employee. She is a teacher by profession, but she does not teach because there is no work. 

She has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos for 2 years. She sells beauty products via catalogue to help her husband with the household expenses until she can find a position at a high school. 

With the new loan of S/.1,300.00 nuevos soles she will buy: 4 men's colognes, 1 shaving cream, 1 sunblock, 2 lipsticks, 1 eyeshadow quartet, 1 shampoo,  1 hair dye, 1 mascara, 1 eyebrow pencil, 1 face powder, 1 baby cologne, 1 reducing cream, 1 women's cologne, 1 hand cream.   

The earnings are small but enough to be able to pay for her account in the community bank. She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for the opportunity.

loans.use: She will buy: 4 men's colognes, 1 shaving cream, 1 sunblock, 2 lipsticks, 1 eyeshadow quartet, 1 shampoo, 1 hair dye, 1 mascara,1 eyebrow pencil, 1 facepowder, 1 baby cologne, 1 reducing cream,  1 women's cologne,1 hand cream.

loans.name: Mariposas De Barrio Alto Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama Mariposas de barrio alto y tiene este nombre porque son grandes artistas de la supervivencia tras sus espectaculares colores, formas, y esconden talentos insospechados; barrio alto por  el lugar de donde se reúnen, se ubica en el Estado de Hidalgo. El grupo esta conformado por 11 integrantes es la primera vez que realiza un crédito. La señora Rosa Aide S. T. es integrante del grupo. Tiene 36 años, estudio el la secundaria, y tiene en total 2 hijas mujeres. Ella vende ropa que inicio desde hace 2 años. Solicita el préstamo para comprar mercancía para agrandar su  negocio. Los clientes dicen que les agrada comprar con ella porque  la ropa es de buena calidad y barata, la señora es amable y muy alegre. Al momento de solicitar este préstamo se siente contenta y con muchas ganas de trabajar, ya que solicito el crédito para comprar más mercancia y sus clientes tengan de donde escoger y para seguir brindando un buen servicio, y a su vez lograr su sueño de poner un local y así apoyar a los gastos de su familia pra brindarles una mejor vida de calidad.
texts.en:
This group is called 'Mariposas de Barrio Alto' (Butterflies of Barrio Alto).  The 'butterflies' part of the name was chosen because the group's members are great survival artists behind their spectacular colors and shapes, and they hide unexpected talents.  'Barrio Alto' is the name of the place where the group meets.  The group is located in the State of Hidalgo.

This group has 11 members and this is the first time that they have taken out a loan.  Rosa Aide S. T. is a member of the group.  She is 36 years old, has a high school level of education, and has two daughters.  She started selling clothes two years ago.

Rosa is requesting this loan to buy merchandise in order to expand her business.  Her customers say that they like to buy from her because the clothes she offers are good quality and also cheap.  Rosa is a kind and very cheerful lady.  At the moment of requesting this loan, she is feeling happy and very keen to work.  She requested her loan to buy more merchandise so that her customers would have more choice and so that she could continue providing them with a good service.  She also wants to fulfil her dream of setting up her own premises and supporting her family's expenses in order to provide them with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Ambar

texts.es: Ámbar, de 26 años, vive en su casa que es propia al lado de sus padres y hermanos menores; juntos buscan salir adelante en busca del progreso. Esta empeñosa joven empezó a trabajar desde que terminó el colegio; y hace un año instaló el negocio de venta de ropa por pedidos. Le va muy bien pues ahora en el negocio le ayuda una prima, pues ella empezó a trabajar en una fábrica con un sueldo estable. Solo durante los fines de semana ella misma vende la ropa y dice que le esta yendo bien por eso es que solicita el crédito que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Dice que esta muy satisfecha pues el negocio ha funcionado sobretodo con la ayuda de esta pariente que tiene muchas amistades que le encargan distintas prendas a la semana. Como es una mujer emprendedora para el futuro tiene planeado instalar una tienda de venta de ropa en un mercado de su zona, pues quiere mejorar sus ventas. Es el segundo crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar con su negocio. Ámbar tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de diversas prendas, pues tiene un pedido pendiente que quiere cumplir.
texts.en:
Ámbar is 26 years old and lives in her own home together with her parents and younger siblings.  Together they look to get ahead in life in search of progress.  This hard-working young woman started work as soon as she finished school.  One year ago she set up a business selling clothes to order.  Her business is doing very well and one of her cousins now helps her in the business.  She started working in a factory, making a stable wage.  She  sells her clothes at weekends.  She tells us that her business is going well and this is why she is requesting a loan which will allow her to continue working in search of progress.  Ámbar tells us that she is very satisfied since her business is working with the help of this family member and she has many friends who order different clothes from her each week.

As Ámbar is an enterprising woman, in the future she plans to set up a clothes store in a local market as she would like to improve her sales.  This is her second loan from MFP and she pledges to make her repayments on time since she doesn't want to let down the people who made this support possible as it will allow her to continue in her business.  Ámbar plans to invest the loan she has requested in buying different items of clothes as she has an order pending that she would like to fill.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to stock her business

loans.name: Milagritos

texts.es: Milagritos, de 26 años, vive en su casa que es propia al lado de su esposo José de 30 años, fabricante de calzado; y sus 2 hijos pequeños; juntos se esfuerzan a diario para salir adelante. Hace más de 4 años esta empeñosa dama se dedica a la producción y comercialización de calzados y sandalias. Manifiesta que cuando era joven ayudaba a sus tíos en el taller de fabricación de zapatos  que esta ubicado en una pieza de su casa, y luego cuando formó su familia no dudo en empezar a vender los zapatos (de acuerdo a la temporada)  en un mercado mayorista de su zona. Ella fabrica una vez a la semana y durante los 5 días útiles restantes vende,  además dice que su mercadería sale constantemente y por eso necesita capital con regular frecuencia; es por esta razón que solicita el crédito que le permitirá comprar materiales para producir al lado de sus familiares mayor cantidad de materiales para calzados y sandalias. Como es una mujer emprendedora para el futuro tiene planeado instalar una tienda de venta de ropa y calzado en un mercado de su zona. Es el segundo crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar con el progreso de su negocio. Milagritos tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de materiales que necesita para la fabricación de todo tipo de calzado, pues necesita abastecerse para la campaña escolar que esta próxima.
texts.en: 26 year old Milagritos lives in her own home along with her 30 year old husband, José, a shoe maker, and their 2 small children. Together they strive daily to move ahead in life. For more than 4 years, this earnest woman has been engaged in making and selling shoes and sandals. When she was young she used to help her uncles in a shoe-making workshop that is located on one floor of her house, and later, when she had her own family, she didn't hesitate to start selling shoes (according to the season) in the major market in the area. She makes shoes one day a week and during the remaining 5 working days she sells them. She says that her merchandise sells-out constantly and so she frequently needs capital. This is why she is requesting a loan that will enable her to buy materials to make, along with her family, a greater quantity of shoes and sandals. As she is an enterprising woman, for the future she plans to start a store selling clothes and shoes in the neighborhood market. This is the second loan that she has had from MFP and she promises to make the repayments punctually as she doesn't want to be seen in a bad light by the people who are making this contribution that will enable her to keep building her business. Milagritos plans to use the loan to buy the materials to make all types of shoes, and she also needs supplies for the upcoming school year.

loans.use: To buy materials for making shoes.

loans.name: Pascuala

texts.es: Pascuala, de 45 años, vive en su casa que es propia al lado de su esposo Javier de 44 años, que es taxista  y sus cuatro hijos, de los cuales se hace cargo de los tres menores, pues el mayor trabaja y estudia; juntos se esfuerzan cada día para salir adelante. Desde hace un año, esta emprendedora mujer se dedica a la preparación y venta de variados  bocadillos (como papa rellena, cachanga y mazamorras) además comercializa chicha (refresco peruano) y gelatina  que vende muy bien sobretodo durante la época veraniega. Esta muy satisfecha pues desde que empezó a comercializar sus bocadillos y refrescos afuera de un colegio de su zona le ha ido bien pues los alumnos la prefieren por la calidad de sus productos. Hace unos meses no tenía capital suficiente para invertir en su negocio, pero ahora con el crédito espera aumentar sus ventas y ganancias. Manifiesta que ella misma prepara sus cachangas y  papas rellenas y las ofrece a los alumnos a un módico precio. Como es una mujer emprendedora para el futuro tiene planeado instalar un kiosco fijo dentro de algún centro educativo de su zona.  Es el segundo crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Pascuala tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de ingredientes al por mayor que le hacen falta para continuar preparando sus bocadillos y refrescos, de esta manera espera continuar adelante.
texts.en:
Pascuala is 45 years old.  She lives in her own home together with her husband, 44 year-old Javier who is a taxi driver, and their four children.  The three youngest children are still in their care but the eldest is working and studying.  Together they work hard every day to get ahead in life.

For one year, this enterprising woman has been making and selling a variety of snacks such as 'papa rellena' (mashed potatoes shaped around a filling of ground beef and fried), 'cachanga' (fried tortillas) and 'mazamorra' (a corn-based pudding).  She also sells 'chicha' (a Peruvian soft drink) and gelatin desserts which sell very well, especially during the summer.  Pascuala is very satisfied because since she started selling her snacks and drinks outside a local school her business has done very well.  The students like buying from her because she sells good-quality products.

Some months ago, Pascuala didn't have enough capital to invest in her business but now she hopes to use her loan to increase her sales and profits.  She tells us that she prepares her 'cachangas' and 'papas rellenas' herself and offers them for sale to the students at a reasonable price.  As she is an enterprising woman, in the future she plans to set up a fixed stall inside a local school.

This is Pascuala's second loan with MFP and she pledges to make her repayments on time as she doesn't want to let down the people who made this support possible as it will allow her to continue working in search of progress.  Pascuala plans to invest the loan she has requested in buying ingredients she needs to keep preparing her snacks and drinks wholesale.  In this way, she hopes to continue making progress.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for making snacks and soft drinks

loans.name: Las Esforzadas Group

texts.es:
Rosalía forma parte D. Banco “Las Esforzadas” conformado por 14 emprendedores, que se desempeñan en el rubro D. comercio, específicamente; venta de joyas, ropa y abarrotes. Todos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Talca.
Rosalía quien en la foto aparece sentada y es la primera D. lado izquierdo, se dedica a la venta de joyas y ropa desde hace 4 años.
Su mercadería la compra en el barrio “Patronato” de la ciudad de Santiago. 
Su negocio lo realiza puerta a puerta y en tiendas comerciales, ya que Rosalía trabajó durante muchos años en tiendas, por lo que conoció mucha gente quienes ahora son sus clientes frecuentes, llegando a tener 50 clientes actualmente. 
Con el préstamo comprará ropa y joyas para invertir en su negocio y poder aumentar así sus ingresos. 
Rosalía vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 10 y 4 años de edad.
El sueño de Rosalía es tener un local establecido, en el centro de la ciudad de Talca, donde pueda aumentar su clientela y generar más ganancias. En el ámbito personal Rosalía anhela que sus hijos tengan una mejor calidad en su educación.
Su gran motivación es sacar adelante a su familia, para brindarles una vida más confortable. 
Ella está muy agradecida de Fondo Esperanza. Le gusta mucho participar de las reuniones, ya que se entretiene en éstas. Además es presidenta D. Banco. En cuanto al financiamiento que recibe por medio de Fondo Esperanza, ha sido un gran aporte para su negocio, ya que podrá invertir y aumentar sus ingresos.
Talca pertenece a la región D. Maule, ubicada en la zona centro D. país. Constituye el centro administrativo, económico y cultural de la región, siendo la ciudad más importante D. Valle Central chileno. Sobre Talca existe una curiosa referencia en Chile, la frase "Talca, París, y Londres". Entre los mitos al respecto, algunos dicen que es una derivación de la originalmente dicha por un inglés "Talca parece Londres", por la abundante neblina que cubre frecuentemente la ciudad en la temporada invernal, a semejanza de la capital D. Reino Unido.
texts.en:
Rosalía is a member of the Communal Bank “Las Esforzadas” (The Hardworking Ones), which consists of fourteen entrepreneurs who engage in the retail trade. Specifically they sell jewelry, clothing, and groceries. All of them live in the city of Talca.

In the photograph, Rosalía is the first person seated on the left. She has been selling jewelry and clothing for four years. Rosalía buys her merchandise in the Patronato neighborhood in the city of Santiago. Her business involves selling door-to-door and to commercial shops. As a result of working many years in retail, Rosalía developed many connections who are now regular customers. She currently has fifty clients. With this loan, Rosalía will invest in her business by purchasing clothing and jewelry to help increase her revenues.

She dreams of having an established shop in central Talca so that she can expand her customer base and generate more income. In her personal life, Rosalía hopes to see her children have a better quality education. Her greatest wish is for her family to get ahead and to provide them a more comfortable life. Rosalía is extremely grateful to Fondo Esperanza. She enjoys participating in the meetings and gets great amusement from them. In addition, Rosalía serves as the Communal Bank president. The loans from Fondo Esperanza have been a great help to her business because they have allowed her to invest and helped to increase her income.

Talca is located in Maule region in central Chile. It is the administrative, economic, and cultural hub of the region as well as the largest city in Chile’s Central Valley. There is a curious saying in Chile, the phrase “Talca, Paris, and London”. Among the many legends that explain the derivation of this phrase, some say it was originally spoken by an Englishman who said “Talca looks like London”, referring to the abundant fog that frequently covers the city during the winter season, similar to the British capital.

loans.use: To purchase jewelry and clothing.

loans.name: El Esfuerzo Es Grande Group

texts.es: La Sra. Lila, tiene 5 hijos, es conviviente  y  trabaja con Edaprospo por primera vez, Lila  es integrante  del grupo “El Esfuerzo es Grande”, grupo conformado por 8 amigas que le pusieron este nombre porque el esfuerzo para poner un negocio es grande. Lila  trabaja vendiendo comida almuerzos, marcianos desde hace 3  años, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación ha  logrado darles a sus hijos educación, ha construido su casa  y a su vez le ha brindado una mejor calidad de vida a  su familia. Con el fin de seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar un carrito sanguchero  y así vender sanguches, salchipapas. Sabemos que Lila  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran
texts.en:
Sra. Lila is in a common law marriage and has five children. This is her first time to work with EDAPROSPO. Lila is a member of the group “El Esfuerzo es Grande” (The Effort is Great), which consists of eight friends who chose this name because starting a business requires a great deal of effort.

Lila has been selling lunches and frozen fruit treats for three years. Thanks to her effort and dedication, she has been able to provide her children with an education, build her house, and give her family a better quality of life. In order to continue growing, Lila is requesting a loan to buy a food cart for selling sandwiches and “salchipapas” (sausages and fried potatoes). She is confident of accomplishing her goals through much work and effort, and with the help of the loans from EDAPROSPO.

loans.use: To purchase a food cart.

loans.name: Liana

texts.es:
Liana tiene 23 años de edad, es casada y reside junto a su esposos e hijos en el distrito de Guadalupe ubicado en la provincia de Pacasmayo, una zona con bastante movimiento comercial que se encuentra ubicada en la región La Libertad, a más de dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Ella cuenta con una bodega instalada en su domicilio. Allí  ofrece en venta a sus vecinos diversos productos de consumo diario entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes. El negocio cuenta con una antigüedad de 2 años y actualmente cuenta con una clientela fija y fidelizada. Gracias a esta actividad ella ayuda a su esposo a mantener a su familia y sacarla adelante durante todo este tiempo.

Liana desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más mercadería de modo que pueda satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1700 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Liana is 23 years old and married. She lives with her husband and children in the District of Guadalupe in Pacasmayo Province. There is significant commercial activity in this area. The community is located in La Libertad region, which is more than two hours away from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque region.

Liana has a store established in her home. There she offers her neighbors different consumer products such as basic necessities and groceries. Her business has been in existence for two years and currently has a loyal and established customer base. Thanks to her business, she is able to help her husband support their family and move themselves forward all the time.

Liana wants to expand her business by purchasing more merchandise to help her satisfy the demands of her customers. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1700 PEN.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Feliciana

texts.es:
Feliciana, tiene 49 años D. edad, tiene tres hijos, nació en la ciudad D. Paurcartambo y actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad D. Urubamba. Feliciana se dedica a la venta D. verduras como por ejemplo zapallos, jora y choclos. Ya son 20 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo.  Feliciana en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar verduras como por ejemplo maíz y zapallos.   

Feliciana pertenece al banco comunal “Mainique” D. la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Feliciana is 49 years old and has three children. She was born in the city of Paurcartambo, but now she lives in the city of Urubamba. Feliciana sells vegetables such as squash and corn. She has been in this business for twenty years and has done very well as a result of the effort she puts into her business. Feliciana is taking this opportunity to request a loan to buy vegetables, such as corn and squash.

She is a member of the Communal Bank “Mainique” which is part of Asociación Arariwa. Feliciana is grateful for the opportunity being given to her and promises to complete her payments on time.

loans.use: To purchase vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria, tiene 41 años de edad, tiene seis hijos, nació en la ciudad Urubamba del departamento de Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad. Maria se dedica a la venta de verduras es mayorista, ella reparte a los revendedores y vendedoras del mercado de Urubamba. Ya son 15 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Maria en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar maíz.  

Maria pertenece al banco comunal “Mainique” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Maria is 41 years old and has six children. She was born in the city of Urubamba in the Department of Cusco and still lives there. Maria sells vegetables as a wholesaler. She distributes her products to retailers and merchants at the market in Urubamba. Maria has been in this business for fifteen years and has done very well as a result of the effort she puts into her work. She is taking this opportunity to request a loan to buy corn.

Maria is a member of the Communal Bank “Mainique” which is part of Asociación Arariwa. She is grateful for the opportunity being given to her and promises to complete her payments on time.

loans.use: To purchase corn.
